description:
stack@lukasz:~/nova$ nova-volume-usage-audit --config-file /etc/nova/nova.conf 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/nova-volume-usage-audit", line 7, in <module>
    execfile(__file__)
  File "/opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-volume-usage-audit", line 66, in <module>
    utils.default_cfgfile()
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'default_cfgfile'
title: nova-volume-usage-audit doesn't work in folsom

commit d768ae29eb1ebf434119f8a7d921dd7c1262af01
Author: Chuck Short <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Oct 10 10:01:22 2012 -0500

    Fix nova-volume-usage-audit
    
    utils.default_cfgfile have been removed from nova/utils, so
    remove it here as well.
    
    Fixes LP: #1065069
    
    Change-Id: I71f6c7850123ef0c1ef4fedf608de13b31dafb32
    Signed-off-by: Chuck Short <email address hidden>
